text:
Focus your performance optimization efforts on the <https://pagespeed.web.dev/report?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.mevisio.com%2F|recommendations Google provides> that address LCP and TBT, those are <https://googlechrome.github.io/lighthouse/scorecalc/#FCP=1860&TTI=6073&SI=3494&TBT=1803&LCP=3695&CLS=0.13&FMP=4935&device=mobile&version=9.6.6|your two largest areas of improvement>.

I’m giving a talk next week at <https://events.HubSpot.com/events/details/HubSpot-HubSpot-global-presents-HubSpotextend/|HubSpot.Extend()> on CMS Hub best practices. I’ll be going over a lot of topics but I do talk about optimizing for site speed there.
Also highly highly recommend checking out our guide on optimizing for speed <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/guides/speed>
